title: 44: Radical roots, Slow Money, CSAs and Allies.
subtitle: 44: Radical roots, Slow Money, CSAs and Allies.
summary:
This month we explore radical roots and cider apples with a farming couple in Oregon. We hear about a different type of investment, the Slow Money movement, where healthy soil is a good return for your money. We talk CSAs in Northern Ireland and we end with a call for allyship in the kitchen from a passionate chef. 

Thanks to Rebel Kitchen for supporting this episode.
